Question.Subject: My computer keeps opening new windows to my homepage?
Question.Content:
What the hell is wrong with my computer? It just keeps opening new pages (to my homepage) and won't stop! It doesn't open a window to any porn site or a bullsh*t "reward" site, it just keeps opening to my home page. I have like 30 windows to my home page.
It's more annoying than dangerous, but I still want it to stop
Question.ChosenAnswer: re-boot your comp, and try again.. If the comp keeps doing the same thing, then congratulations you’ve been selected to be the next person to go to a porn site and win a prize your prize is this nasty little bug on your comp that a virus scan may not find But hey it could be worse.. You could have gotten a “little bug” that will nave go away in you

Answer.Content: re-boot your comp, and try again.. If the comp keeps doing the same thing, then congratulations you’ve been selected to be the next person to go to a porn site and win a prize your prize is this nasty little bug on your comp that a virus scan may not find But hey it could be worse.. You could have gotten a “little bug” that will nave go away in you
